title: Angela Samota // 56
description:
In 1984, a 20-year-old woman spent a fall Friday evening out with friends. When she got home around 2am, she made a terrifying call to her boyfriend. Less than 30 minutes later, she was found brutally murdered in her Dallas condo. So who killed her, and why? This is the murder of Angela Samota.

_______
